title: Save/Load Customised User Layouts
content: You can set up and customise your own favourite screen layout and save them for later usage.

title: Auto-lock (PIN) to Prevent Unauthorised Access
content: The first thing you can do to protect your account is to set your PIN. The OpenMarkets Equix Web will be auto-locked after 5 minutes of inactivity. If anything looks suspicious, you can change your PIN immediately, other sessions will be immediately forced log-out.

title: Market News
content: Related news tab shows ASX announcements that are related to stocks in personal watch-list and portfolio. All market tab displays everything that is submitted to ASX.

title: New Order Confirmation Screen
content: New order confirmation screen with better visibility.

title: Country Flag for Each Stock
content: Each stock code now has its country flag attached.

title: New Data Highlight
content: New market pricing, news and orders are flashed to highlight updates.

title: Order Confirmation
content: Extra step to confirm order information before placing.

title: Updated Order Pad
content: Updated order pad to be more user friendly.

title: Market Overview
content: Refreshed overview screen shows major ASX indices and key FX rates.

title: Account Information
content: New widget to show account information, such as HIN, address, etc,...
